title: The Beatitudes: The Pure in Heart
description:
Readings from:

Matthew 5:8

Psalm 24:3-5; 51:10

2 Timothy 2:22

Hebrews 10:19-22

Today's passages were read by Kevin Garcia, who works in a mentoring ministry in West Dallas and is a future church planter.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
